detaileddescription.para: SW Unit testing is accomplished through SWATT. The test case are based on this design, and shall also cover the configuration options. For details please refer the chapter Test methods for Unit test. Include own header files in the testcase file (SWATT), no stubs for data types and function prototypes. Add software requirement IDs in the testcases. Expected test coverage (100%) and type of test coverage (C1).

sect1.title: Verification by Review
sect1.para: The review is available in git. Any points linked to JIRA tickes.

sect1.title: Verification by Testing
sect1.para: The tests are created using SWATT and are available in *.c.test files. For more details check the File section.
